# /(_:_:)

**Operator**

Generates an integer column by dividing each element in an optional column type by the corresponding elements of a column type.

## Declaration

```swift
func / <L, R>(lhs: L, rhs: R) -> Column<R.Element> where L : OptionalColumnProtocol, R : ColumnProtocol, L.WrappedElement : BinaryInteger, L.WrappedElement == R.Element
```

## Parameters

- **lhs**: An optional column type.
- **rhs**: A column type.

## Return Value

A new column with the same type as the right column.

## Generating a Column by Dividing Two Columns

- **/(_:_:)**: Generates an integer column by dividing each element in a column type by the corresponding elements of another.
- **/(_:_:)**: Generates an integer column by dividing each element in a column type by the corresponding elements of an optional column type.
- **/(_:_:)**: Generates a floating-point column by dividing each element in a column type by the corresponding elements of another.
- **/(_:_:)**: Generates a floating-point column by dividing each element in a column type by the corresponding elements of an optional column type.
- **/(_:_:)**: Generates a floating-point column by dividing each element in an optional column type by the corresponding elements of a column type.
